name: E S C A P E (Ryder Studios)
name_original: E S C A P E (Ryder Studios)
description:
I N F O R M A T I O N

E S C A P E is a puzzle platformer with a bit of story. You've to escape the prison together with other guys. And remember you're stronger together.

G A M E    JAM

This game is made for the Brakeys game jam 2021.01, the theme was "stronger together" and the game fits into the theme like this:

You're to weak alone to escape this prison, you're stronger together ! C R E D I T S

Everything is made by Daniel Muenstermann and some usefull tools for audio (ecrett music maker, sfxr)
